numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice that there are fewer head coaches of color than players of color.
2. In football, 74 percent of NFL players are players of color.
3. In football, 13 percent of NFL head coaches are people of color.
4. I wonder what percent of staff in major sports leagues are people of color.
5. Assistant managers are staff in major sports leagues.
6. Coaches are staff in major sports leagues.
7. Nutritionists are staff in major sports leagues.
9. For a while, people of color have excelled at sports.
10. It is important that people of color have the opportunity to be coaching staff.
11. It is important that people of color are involved in sports in ways other than being players.
12. Some teams use people of color as players.
14. If a team uses people of color as players, then the team should respect people of color in hiring coaching staff.
15. The headline is: Diversity in major sports leagues off the field.
